Americans visit DPRK
    Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Donald P. Greg, president of the board Korea Associated in U.S. and ex-U.S. Ambassador to South Korea, and his party visited the DPRK from Nov. 2 to 5.
 During their visit, they met first vice Foreign Minister Kang Sok Ju and other officials concerned and had a sincere and candid exchange of views on a number of issues of concern including the DPRK-U.S. relations.
